name: Arthur's Quest: Battle for the Kingdom
name_original: Arthur's Quest: Battle for the Kingdom
description:
The Epic Struggle for the Kingdom Continues...

You are Arthur, vowed to chivalry, honor and fated to rule the land. With a powerful wizard by your side, you must defeat the legendary evil that threatens to keep you from your rightful place as the greatest king of all time.

  • Explosive first-person action puts you in the heart of the battle for the throne.

  • Explore 11 levels on a quest for Excalibur's jeweled scabbard & the defeat of Arthur's most powerful enemies.

  • Robust 3D environments bring Arthur's legendary battles to life.

  • Lose yourself in vivid cinematics.

  • Advanced enemy A.I. will challenge even the most battle-hardened knight.
